data.title: the name of the game
data.meta_description: THE NAME OF THE GAME translate: самое главное, суть . Learn more in the Cambridge English-Russian Dictionary.
data.text:
the main purpose or most important part of an activity

самое главное, суть

Popularity is the name of the game in television.

(Translation of the name of the game from the Cambridge English–Russian Dictionary © Cambridge University Press)

C1
